com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog

Class FormModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.FormModel

  • public abstract class FormModel
extends java.lang.Object
    FormModel is an abstract class that represents the backing data for a form. It provides a mechanism for form elements to retrieve their values to display to the user and persist changes to the model upon changes.

    • Method Detail

      • setBackingValue

        protected abstract void setBackingValue(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.Object newValue)
        This method is called when a form element changes its value through user input or external changes. Subclasses must implement this method to update the backing model.
        Parameters:
        name - the field name to set the value for
        newValue - the value to set

      • getBackingValue

        protected abstract java.lang.Object getBackingValue(java.lang.String name)
        This method is called whenever the form needs the current value for a specific field. Subclasses must implement this method to provide the form access to the backing model.
        Parameters:
        name - the field name to retrieve the value for
        Returns:
        the current value of the specified field

      • getValue

        public final java.lang.Object getValue(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the value for the specified field name.
        Parameters:
        name - the field name
        Returns:
        the value currently set for the specified field name

      • setValue

        public final void setValue(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.Object newValue)
        Sets a value for the specified field name. A property change notification is fired to registered listeners if the field's value changed.
        Parameters:
        name - the field name to set the value for
        newValue - the value to set
